  inputDir: "gathered/"
  thisDir:  "cook/"

    - DataCrunch

```{r KnitrOpts, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath('../'))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, error=TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
loadedObjects <- represtools::LoadObjects(params)
```

```{r}
colnames(dfSchoolInfo) <- gsub(".", "", colnames(dfSchoolInfo), fixed=TRUE)

dfSchoolInfo <- dfSchoolInfo %>% 
  mutate(FreeAndReducedPct = TotalFreeandReducedLunch / TotalStudents)
```

```{r GatherObjects}
lstObjects <- represtools::ListObjects(pattern = c("df"))
represtools::DescribeObjects(represtools::NamesToObjects(lstObjects), c(str, summary))
```

```{r Save}
save(file = represtools::OutputFile(params)
     , list = lstObjects)
```
